abstract: Citigroup and Terra Firma will begin talks next month to settle their fight over EMI, the music company acquired by Terra Firma in a 2007 leveraged buyout.
snippet: Citigroup and Terra Firma will begin talks next month to settle their fight over EMI, the music company acquired by Terra Firma in a 2007 leveraged buyout.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup and the British private equity shop Terra Firma will begin talks next month to settle their fight over EMI, the music company acquired by Terra Firma in a 2007 leveraged buyout, two people with direct knowledge of the matter told DealBook on Thursday.

headline.main: Terra Firma and Citi to Begin EMI Talks
